__e: Now, I'd be a fool if I didn't think you were all chit-chatting about another event that happened recently, but I'm here to tell you the truth.
Listen, Ray, I don't know what the hell went down between you and Hector, but if you can help him, then... then you might just help me too.
Yeah, I don't know what happened between you and your daughter, but... I would've loved to have a mother like you.
Let's go. Wait, I... I really can't sit in the car the whole ride home without asking what happened between you and Alex.
Anyway, I told her what happened between you and me, and she's concerned about us seeing each other at work.
Yeah, I don't know what happened between you and your daughter, but... I would've loved to have a mother like you.
